name: Infinity
description: Infinity is a simple game. It has simple objectives, and a simple goal. The game features progressively harder levels. Each level builds upon the previous. However, what sets Infinity apart from other platformers, is the lack of checkpoints. Infinity does not feature saves, checkpoints or level selection.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: AMD A4-4000 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 7480D DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Targeted 60 FPS
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Pentium G4560 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: HD Graphics 610 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Targeted 60 FPS
